## 49. SMOKE
### Definition
Smoke as the result of combustion of wood, grass, dry dung (not after cremation). Should be distinguished from ‘vapour’ or specific kinds of smoke (e.g., ‘(thick) black smoke’).  (GLD)

### Contexts
1. With no wind, smoke from the bonfire rises straight up. (GLD) 2. Smoke gets in my eyes. (GLD)
